sense.gloss: to call out (to), to call, to invoke
to designate, to name, to brand

x: 呼び出す・よびだす・1

sense.gloss: usher who calls the names of wrestlers, sweeps the ring, etc.
telephone number at which a person without a telephone can be reached
box-shaped area containing clean water for rinsing oneself (in an Edo-period bathhouse)
high-ranking prostitute in the Yoshiwara district (Edo period)
unlicensed prostitute in the Fukagawa red-light district (Edo period)
name, designation, denomination, naming, giving a name
popular name, common name, given name
to call out to, to hail, to address
uh huh, yeah yeah, right, gotcha

sdata.j: ↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓が↑乱気流↑↓らんきりゅう↓に↑近付↑↓ちかづ↓いていたため↑操縦↑↓そうじゅう↓↑士↑↓し↓は↑乗客↑↓じょうきゃく↓にシートベルトを↑締↑↓し↓めるよう↑呼↑↓よ↓びかけた。
sdata.e: As the plane was approaching turbulence, the pilot asked the passengers aboard the plane to fasten their seat belts.

sdata.j: ↑結婚式↑↓けっこんしき↓ではあまりにたくさんのごちそうが↑出↑↓だ↓されたので、↑新郎↑↓しんろう↓↑新婦↑↓しんぷ↓はもっと↑多↑↓おお↓くの↑人↑↓ひと↓を↑呼↑↓よ↓ぶべきだったかなと↑思↑↓おも↓い↑始↑↓はじ↓めた。
sdata.e: Food and drink were served in such profusion at the wedding that the bride and groom began to wonder if they should not have invited more guests.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は、↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑友人↑↓ゆうじん↓と↑呼↑↓よ↓べる↑世界↑↓せかい↓でただ↑一↑↓いち↓↑人↑↓にん↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓です。
sdata.e: You are the only man in the world that I can call my friend.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑名前↑↓なまえ↓が↑呼↑↓よ↓ばれるのが↑聞↑↓き↓こえませんでしたか。
sdata.e: Didn't you hear your name called?

sdata.j: あなたは↑名前↑↓なまえ↓を↑呼↑↓よ↓ばれたのが↑聞↑↓き↓こえなかったのですか。
sdata.e: Didn't you hear your name called?

sdata.j: ↑具合↑↓ぐあい↓がよくありません。↑医者↑↓いしゃ↓を↑呼↑↓よ↓びにやってくれませんか。
sdata.e: I'm sick. Will you send for a doctor?

sdata.j: ↑緊急↑↓きんきゅう↓の↑場合↑↓ばあい↓は↑警察↑↓けいさつ↓を↑呼↑↓よ↓びなさい。
sdata.e: In case of an emergency, call the police.

sdata.j: ↑去年↑↓きょねん↓↑建↑↓た↓てられた↑遊園↑↓ゆうえん↓↑地↑↓ち↓のおかげで、その↑町↑↓まち↓は↑人気↑↓にんき↓を↑呼↑↓よ↓ぶようになった。
sdata.e: Thanks to the amusement park built last year, the city has become popular.

sdata.j: ↑救急↑↓きゅうきゅう↓↑車↑↓しゃ↓を↑呼↑↓よ↓んでくれ。

words.gloss: to call out (to), to call, to invoke
